TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {36525=Preseason All-America honoree . . . Returning starter and all-league player . . . Claimed All-GLIAC Second Team honors for the second-straight year in 2011 . . . Started all 11 games in 2011 . . . Finished with 75 total tackles on 21 solo hits and 54 assists, which ranked fourth on the team . . . Led team with 10 tackles for loss (-45 yards) . . . Also had squad-best seven quarterback sacks (-37 yards) . . . Blocked three kicks, recovered two fumbles and forced one miscue . . . Also had two quarterback hurries and an interception . . . Started all 11 games in 2010 . . . All-GLIAC Second Team pick . . . Team Coaches Award honoree . . . Had eight sacks for -65 yards . . . Totaled 52 tackles with 19 solo efforts . . . Blocked four kicks on the year . . . Totaled 10.5 tackles for loss (-70 yards) . . . Finished with seven tackles in two different games . . . Had five quarterback hurries, a pass breakup and a fumble recovery . . . Started 10 games and played in 11 contests during the 2009 season . . . Earned All-GLIAC Honorable Mention accolades . . . Was voted FSU's Outstanding Defensive Rookie . . . Placed fourth on the team with 60 total tackles, including 24 solo stops . . . Had a team-high four quarterback sacks for -11 yards . . . Also had six tackles for loss (-10 yards) . . . Recovered a team-best three fumbles and had three quarterback hurries to go with a blocked kick . . . Received team’s Newcomer Award for efforts during 2009 spring ball . . . Redshirted during the 2008 campaign . . . 2008 graduate of Chicago’s Mt. Carmel High School . . . Coached by Frank Lenti . . . Helped team to a 12-1 mark and a Illinois state semifinal appearance as a senior . . . Team claimed a conference championship . . . Caught nine passes for 156 yards and a score . . . Second-Team All-Conference pick in the Chicago Catholic League . . . Team claimed state runner-up laurels with a 12-2 mark his junior year . . . Also wrestled and was both a regional and sectional champion along with being a state qualifier . . . Competed in track and field . . . Interests include cooking . . . His brother, Justin, currently plays college football as a wide receiver at Wyoming . . . FSU Letters: Three . . . Birthdate: 3/11/90., 178921=(231) 591-2869 (Fax), 178873=(231) 591-2860 (Office)}
